Title: Normal Skin
Description: This skin is neither too dry nor too oily. It has regular texture, no imperfections and a clean, soft appearance, and does not need special care.

Title: Dry Skin
Description: Feeling of tightness and roughness. It may also acquire an ashy gray color, with occurrence of desquamation, itching, redness and small cracks.

Title: Oily Skin
Description: Oily skin has a porous, humid and bright appearance. It is caused by excessive fat production by sebaceous glands.

Title: Combination Skin
Description: Characteristics of both dry and oily skin. The area with more oil is usually the T- zone (forehead, nose, and chin), while the cheeks is normal or dry.
